body_html: Having the C# wrapper use the C API through DllImport is the right approach. I have written many such things (having had to interface with Matlab-exported C a number of times). You can see something of my similar work here: https://github.com/BrannonKing/NLoptNet . I'm willing to work on it. Now I just need a Windows DLL.
